if you were hesitant whether to choose this one or the original counter strike, i really advice you to choose this one beceause not tonly will you be able to play garry's mod (a very good and fun game) with all it's graphics and content missing from the game files but also you will pick the best game out of the 2 choices beceause counter strike source is basically counter strike 1.6 but with better graphics, the source engine and also a more precise game (spray pattern,etc) also this game really aged well in comparison with cs 1.6

Это ремейк Counter-Strike 1.6 , но с новыми картами. Правда,сервера почти мертвы (нет игроков).Но если нужна игра только для того что-бы повеселиться с друзьями,это идеальный вариант.Как минимум я с другом играю.
先抛开早已落后的画质不说，它是经典中的经典，你可能会以为他只是个只能玩玩爆破的落后游戏，其实不然，各种各样有趣的服务器，友好的大佬，极低的配置，它的一切让我只能说，真香

[b][Since "Counter-Strike" and "Counter-Strike: Source" are pretty much identical besides graphical enhancement and this is the most excusable Source engine re-release due to the many improvements and non-existent problems here that are present in other Source engine remakes, this review will be almost verbatim to my original "Counter-Strike" review.][/b]

[i]Counter-Strike: Source[/i] is one of those multiplayer-only games that really may stand the test of time decades after its release due to its simple yet effective premise and gameplay.

What the developers have created here is very impressive, even if not by today's standards, what it has inspired and the fact that it is still played to this very day says enough on the basis of its quality. Though at first it may be a little difficult to get into, as many players are veterans that have been playing since the game first released, you are more likely than not to come around and see just what this game has to offer. I would highly recommend you first practice with friends if possible, or find people in a server that can teach you the basics and a few skills so that you are at least not completely lost when diving in to this classic and sort of dated experience. If you own [i]Counter-Strike: Condition Zero[/i], I would also recommend you play those missions built around artificial intelligence players, as it is a great way to practice with with enemies more your skill level. Arguably, something like this should have been implemented into the base game, but alas this is not the case, much to the dismay of new players.

The concept is that of the conflict between two teams: the [i]Terrorists[/i] and the [i]Counter-Terrorists[/i], both of which are pretty self-explanatory. Though there are a few standout mechanics in this game that differ from others of the time, such as buying weapons with in-game currency, the function of this mod turned intellectual property is pretty simplistic in a good way, making it easily accessible in terms of gameplay. The main two objective-based modes are bomb defusal and hostage rescue, both of which are enjoyable in their respective ways, and they have obvious places in modern games that took inspiration from the basics of what was here, only expanding the influence this game holds over the multiplayer genre to this very day. Though the player base does prefer modded servers and the like nowadays, there are still enough playing the quality original maps that allow you to enjoy yourself and bask in the original experience of what [i]Counter-Strike: Source[/i] brought to the table when it came out so long ago.

[i]Counter-Strike: Source[/i] is just one of those timeless classics, but it is much more impressive solely based on the fact that is is a strictly multiplayer game, which usually is a type of title that dies out a few years after initial release and loses any value once the player base disappears, but this game is a definite anomaly, one that has outlasted many of its peers and has influence on other titles to support it even when it inevitably does lose its loyal base of players.

[b][RATING: 9.4/10][/b]

玩两年了，根本停不下来！
虽说CSS已经有一段年头了，但还开着的服务器也挺多，目前的游玩人数也挺多，可以说这个游戏仍然处于青春状态
相比CSGO，CSS能在低配机（比如我的渣机）以较流畅的帧率运行（我玩CSGO的时候fps稳定在12~16之间，而玩CSS我只偶尔觉得卡顿）；相比其他系列，CSS的画质、特效和物理效果等各种又十分出众
支持自定义地图和模式也使得CSS的娱乐性经久不衰
买就对了！

Très bon FPS, qualité de CS:GO avec la fluidité de Counter Strike, bon pour tout les ordinateurs, même les moins puissants (je joue avec un ordinateur qui date de 2010). Je le recommande fortement aux amateurs de la saga Counter Strike
El Counter Strike pero con el motor Source. Muy bueno.
Мне очень понравилось эта игра! В чёмто лучше CS:GO
релна игра, само че цс го си е цс го, не че съм против и тая, но цс го си е на 1-во място

CSS :

 Relaxing - Beautiful Maps - Beautiful Lighting - The Colors Are Beautiful - The Physics Rules Are Very Real - The Guns Are Very Classic And Beautifully Designed And Their Sound Is Very Beautiful - The Modes Are Versatile - The Servers Have Law And Admin - Cheaters are quickly blocked - There is a lot of freedom in the game (you can install any skin or Use any spray or anything you like as a spray. ) - You only pay once to buy the game.

CSGO (Change Game Name to Counter-Strike: FORTNITE or Counter-Strike:PAY TO WIN or
Counter-Strike: F U C K I N G S H I T)  :

Madhouse - Nervous Wars - The maps are flawed - The game is very dark and colorless - The guns are like toys You feel they are made of plastic and their sound is like breathing water spray - Mods are very limited - Servers They have no law and administration. - They give the power to crazy players to take you out of the game by Collusion.  the cheaters aren't blocked most of the time - there's no practical freedom in the game (you even have to use ridiculous sprays). 
 Do you know why this game is free? Because you always have to spend that money indefinitely and there is no limit to it. Every day expensive and trivial skins are added, which are just codes that act like cheat. Have you seen the new Agents skin? Very hard to kill them, They seem to have a life hack and even camouflage themselves. 
The csgo is just skin and the richer the winner But in CSS everyone is given equal chance of winning. When you play CSS you are happy but when you play csgo you go crazy. csgo is not a game, just a revenue tool...

And lastly, I'm sorry for valve, who only cares about money and has abandoned beauty game like CSS and doesn't even release an update for it . But my friends, we should not let beautiful games die. Thanks.
